caption.p: FMDV RNA copy number detected by real-time RT-PCR from nasal samples collected from noses of immunized cattle.
Notes: FMDV RNA copy number detected in nasal swabs from infected cattle at indicated time points by real-time RT-PCR. Values are expressed as mean number of FMDV genome copies/mL Â± SD (n=3).
Abbreviations: dpc, days postchallenge; FMDV, foot-and-mouth disease virus; RT-PCR, reverse-transcription polymerase chain reaction; SD, standard deviations.
